title: Frictional, not cyclical, unemployment at NRU

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes an economy at full employment?

choices.label: There is only structural and cyclical unemployment.
There is cyclical, but not structural, unemployment.
There is frictional, but not cyclical, unemployment.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
